TopicTitle: Looking for someone to make 3D models

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I\'m making a mod about mining some resources and reusing them on board of our vessels. I already got some working code and everything seems quite well (but there\'s still some work to do). However, although I\'m good at programming, my modelling skills are... poor :-) And I don\'t have time to learn them, because I even hardly find time to write some code (work, work, work, family, work, work.. .etc.). Also my 'creations' wouldn\'t be even as good as 10% of work of someone experienced :-)

Maybe someone would like to participate in new plugin development and make a few models? About 5-6 of them, not very complicated.

Place in credits guaranteed :-D
If you know how to make textures you can become a member of Eagle industries http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=16370.0
I might be able to make some models for you if you want, depending on the type of stuff you want
